name: Speech synthesis
description: Use a text-to-speech engine to automatically read text aloud.

conditions.name: Supports speech synthesis
conditions.description: True if the current browser supports speech synthesis.

conditions.name: Is speaking
conditions.description: True if currently speaking some text.

conditions.name: On speech ended
conditions.description: Triggered when a phrase finishes being spoken.

conditions.name: On speech error
conditions.description: Triggered if an error occurs when trying to speak text.

actions.name: Speak text
actions.description: Read out some text with speech synthesis.
actions.display_text: Speak text [b]{0}[/b] (language [i]{1}[/i], voice URI [i]{2}[/i], volume [i]{3}[/i] dB, rate [i]{4}[/i], pitch [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Language
params.description: The language of the text, e.g. "en-US" for US English. Leave empty to use the default language.

params.name: Voice URI
params.description: The voice to use. Leave empty to use the default voice.

params.name: Volume
params.description: The volume to speak the text at, in dB attenuation.

params.name: Rate
params.description: The relative speed at which to speak, e.g. 1 for normal, 0.5 for half as fast.

params.name: Pitch
params.description: The relative pitch at which to speak, between 0 and 2.

actions.name: Resume speaking
actions.description: Resume a previously paused speech synthesis.

expressions.name: VoiceCount
expressions.description: Return the number of available voices.

expressions.name: VoiceNameAt
expressions.description: Return the name of a voice at an index.

expressions.name: VoiceLangAt
expressions.description: Return the language of a voice at an index.

expressions.name: VoiceURIAt
expressions.description: Return the URI of a voice at an index.
